mapper.select: select * from sys_menu where is_deleted =0 and is_visiable = 1

WITH RECURSIVE Path AS ( SELECT t1.menu_name,t1.parent_id,t1.router_path FROM sys_menu t1 WHERE t1.router_path = #{routerPath} UNION ALL SELECT t2.menu_name,t2.parent_id,t2.router_path FROM sys_menu t2 JOIN Path t3 ON t2.id = t3.parent_id ) SELECT t4.* FROM Path t4 order by t4.parent_id;
